message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $20,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this is a competitive price.
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $20,000 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $17,000.  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm thinking $14,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
